name: Draft Day Sports: College Basketball 2017
description: Take control as head coach of your favorite college basketball team. Build your coaching profile and settle in on the long road to tournament glory. In addition to winning games and piling up trophies you’re responsible for hiring your staff, researching players, recruiting new talent and of course coaching your team. Look to further your career by improving your coaching resume and prestige to land better jobs or even take on the role of an assistant coach for a totally different way of playing the game. Get immersed in the incredibly detailed simulated game world which sports one of the best recruiting engines in any collegiate video game.
